plugins.name: Localise
plugins.description:
Use real development labels in your designs from your localise.biz projects.


Features

  1. Automatically translate your mockups with real copy
  2. Find any label from Localise and use it in your designs
  3. Update translations so you don’t have to leave Figma
  4. Automatically match copy to existing labels
  5. Compare your Figma copy with Loco labels


How to use the plugin?

Labels are linked to localise by using the asset ID as a layer name. A # sign will be added before the layer name, so you know which copy is managed by Localise.


Where can I find my API key?

Guide to link your account to the Localise plugin

accepted.name: Niels Boey
accepted.description: I design and build digital products

plugins.tagline: Manage your copy in design and code

112439.release_notes:
- Multi-line support: labels will now start a new line whenever there is a line break
- Translation chaching: labels no longer need to reload when changing languages
- Relaunch button: the relaunch button when selecting a layer you previously translated will now show the localise key
- Label formatting: labels will now automatically be bold, italic or underlined when using <b>, <i> or <u> tags (this can be turned off via settings)
- Better support: You can now reset your plugin if anything isn't working anymore, view the documentation from settings or report a bug.

Save translations in a collection which was a beta feature is currently disabled to make it better. Stay tuned for a next update for an improved integration.
112439.tagline: Manage your copy in design and code

plugins.name: Keebone
plugins.description:
Keebone is an innovative project focused on creating a digital toolbox. Our goal is to provide users with convenient and efficient solutions through advanced technology and diverse features, helping users in various fields solve challenges in their digital work.


Main Features:


1.Text Processing

2.Table Generation

3.Icon Referencing

4.Theme Definition


Additionally, more features are continuously being added. You can communicate with us through the suggestion feature within the app or contact us via email. We will provide better services based on your needs.




Keebone は、デジタルツールボックスを構築することに特化した革新的なプロジェクトです。私たちの目標は、先進的な技術と多様な機能を通じて、ユーザーに便利で効率的なソリューションを提供し、さまざまな分野のユーザーがデジタル作業における課題を解決できるようサポートすることです。


主な機能：


1.テキスト処理

2.表作成

3.アイコン参照

4.テーマ定義


さらに、多くの機能が続々と追加されています。アプリ内の提案機能を通じて私たちとコミュニケーションを取るか、メールでご連絡ください。皆様のニーズに応じて、より良いサービスを提供いたします。




Keebone 是一个专注于打造数字工具箱的创新项目。我们的目标是通过先进的技术和多样化的功能，为用户提供便捷、高效的解决方案，帮助不同领域的用户解决各种数字化工作中的难题。


主要功能：


1.文本处理

2.表格生成

3.图标引用

4.主题定义


除此之外，更多功能正在陆续上线中。您可以通过应用内的建议功能与我们沟通，或者通过邮箱与我们联系，我们将根据您的需求提供更优质的服务。

plugins.name: CSSPaint [Beta]
plugins.description:
CSSPaint is a simple Figma plugin that lets you apply CSS styles to your objects and frames swiftly, enhancing design workflow and facilitating better integration between design and development.

  • Better support for flexbox

Head over to the Github repo to contribute, request features or submit feedback/issues, thanks!

plugins.name: bookmarkly 🔖 | File Navigation, Presentation & To Do List
plugins.description:
Jump to key elements and positions in your files.

Bookmarkly transforms your design experience, combining bookmarks, notes, and navigation tools into one powerful plugin.


Use Cases for Bookmarkly

  1. Quick Navigation: Jump to key elements and positions in your Figma & FigJam files.
  2. Presentation Mode: Present your designs seamlessly using Bookmarkly's presentation mode.
  3. Organized Workflow: Mark any page, element, or position as a bookmark for easy access.
  4. Efficient Annotations: Add notes to bookmarks for important information.
  5. To-Do List: Use it as To-Do list to keep track on your work.
  6. Seamless Navigation: Use the history/back function to retrace steps smoothly.
  7. Quick actions to jump from document to document



Key Features

✅ Custom Jump Marks: Quick, personalized navigation

🔖 Interactive bookmarks

📝 Add notes - double as To-dos

🔙 'Back' button to revisit last selections

🎫 Add Hyperlinks to link bookmarks to Jira or Asana Tickets

✈️ Jump, search between your files


🚀 Get started instantly

  1. Just open your file and let the magic unfold


✨ Dev Logs

  1. For all updates and dev logs, visit [Twitter/X]


⏲️ Upcoming features

  1. Your Feedback #1
  2. Color bookmarks
  3. Edit zoom level
  4. Integrate Notely
  5. Search filter
  6. FigJam alpha
  7. Color notes
  8. Drag and drop to change order


🎮 Join our Discord

  1. Discord Server Link


☕ Support Our Journey

Support notely with a coffee or share your feedback to help me grow.


🤘

accepted.name: Dave
accepted.description: Snatching moments from a busy life, I craft tools to simplify designers' work... Writing bios, however, is not my forte. Also love my client work at uxact.ly

plugins.name: Расческа
plugins.description:
Плагин для UX-редакторов, которые подготавливают тексты для разработки. Выделите нужную зону и запустите плагин, чтобы:

  1. проставить неразрывные пробелы около коротких русских слов, чисел и специальных знаков;
  2. превратить отдельно стоящие дефисы (-) в тире (—);
  3. превратить дефисы внутри слов (-) в неразрывные дефисы (‑).


Все функции плагина. Если вам чего-то не хватает, заведите Issue (кнопка New issue) и опишите, что хотите.


Если вам очень помогает плагин, и вы в восторге от него, можете угостить меня кофе 😊

accepted.name: Ruslan Fedorov
accepted.description: Product Designer

plugins.tagline: Подготовьте тексты перед разработкой: неразрывные пробелы и замена дефисов где надо

plugins.name: Magnifier
plugins.description:
Similar plugin: Draw a shape and create the pixelated censor effect


Features

  1. Zoom level from 1x to 5x
  2. Circle or rectangle shape
  3. Stroke color
  4. Corner radius


How to Use

  1. Draw/Place a rectangle over the area you want to magnify, then click "Apply"
  2. Adjust zoom levels, shapes, and other styles, then click "Update"
  3. Select "magnifier_group" at any time to make further updates


Use Cases

  1. Highlighting product features
  2. Explaining step-by-step processes in training materials
  3. Showcasing portfolios and marketing visuals


Pricing

  1. Enjoy 5 free uses with full access to all features.
  2. Unlock unlimited access with free future updates for a one-time purchase.


Tips

  1. After applying the magnifier effect, a group called "magnifier_group" is created. The group layer has a drop shadow effect, which you can adjust in the Design panel.
  2. Within the group, a "magnifier_shape" is created, that has a drop shadow effect for the white glowing effect inside the magnifier, and a stroke for the thickness of the magnifier, which you can adjust in the Design panel.
  3. Make sure the group and its children's names remain unchanged if you want to update it later.


Transform your designs with the magnifier effect, try it today!


Credit: Preview mobile screens by DI_Designing

accepted.name: Saranomy
accepted.description: I make premium Figma Plugins

plugins.tagline: Create magnifier effect to showcase your design

plugins.name: MailerLite
plugins.description:
Skip the tedious work of exporting your images from Figma and then re-uploading them into MailerLite. Export your Figma assets directly to MailerLite’s File manager instead for even smoother campaign creation.


How this plugin works

  1. Select the layer you want to export.
  2. Run the MailerLite plugin.
  3. Choose or create a new folder for exporting your assets.
  4. Click ‘Export to MailerLite’ and locate your assets in the file manager.
  5. If a single file exceeds 2MB, it will be automatically compressed.


Visit MailerLite ->
plugins.tagline: MailerLite: Export Figma assets to File manager

plugins.name: Flows Alicorp
plugins.description:
Español

¡Presentamos nuestro nuevo plugin de Figma diseñado por el equipo de Experience Design de Alicorp, perfecto para darle vida a tus diagramas y flujos de trabajo con flechas personalizables!


Con nuestro plugin, crear conexiones visuales entre tus ideas nunca ha sido tan fácil ni tan divertido. Elige entre líneas curvas, rectas o directas y personaliza cada detalle: desde el color y el grosor hasta la transparencia y el estilo de la línea, ya sea continua o punteada. ¿Necesitas flechas con un toque especial? Ajusta las cabezas de las flechas a tu gusto y añade cajas de texto que se integran perfectamente con el diseño de la línea.


Además, nuestro plugin te permite trabajar como más te convenga: puedes generar flechas automáticamente al seleccionar elementos, crearlas manualmente o modificar tus flechas existentes con un simple "Reiniciar". Todo está diseñado para que tu proceso de diseño sea lo más fluido posible.


¡Dale un vistazo y descubre cómo este plugin puede mejorar tu flujo de trabajo en Figma! ¡Te invitamos a probarlo y llevar tus diseños al siguiente nivel! 🚀


English

Introducing our new Figma plugin, crafted by the Experience Design team at Alicorp, perfect for bringing your diagrams and workflows to life with customizable arrows!


With our plugin, creating visual connections between your ideas has never been easier or more enjoyable. Choose from curved, straight, or direct lines and customize every detail: from color and thickness to transparency and line style, whether continuous or dashed. Need arrows with a unique touch? Adjust the arrowheads to your liking and add text boxes that seamlessly integrate with the line design.


Plus, our plugin adapts to your workflow: automatically generate arrows by selecting elements, create them manually, or modify your existing arrows with a simple "Reset." Everything is designed to make your design process as smooth as possible.


Give it a try and see how this plugin can elevate your Figma workflow! We invite you to test it out and take your designs to the next level! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Crea tus flujos

plugins.name: Image Hotspot
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to add hotspots to specific areas of your images, linking them to additional information, media content, or external links. It is a useful tool for interactive visuals in various applications such as educational materials, e-commerce sites, etc.


While the plugin is still in early alpha and development, it already provides essential functionality and is primarily intended as a useful development tool. It allows to export the data in JSON and CSS formats. The JSON format is intended for further processing in the application, while the CSS format is useful for quick hotspot positioning.


Instructions

  • Upload an image and frame the section you want to add a hotspot to
  • Enter a hotspot name and add it to the selected frame
  • Place the hotspot in the desired area
  • Export hotspot data and image


To convert frame nodes to hotspots, select "Convert" from the notification at the bottom of the screen when the frame is selected. Only a limited set of simple node types such as ellipse, rectangle, polygon, or other components (or instances of components) are transformed.


Feedback and suggestions for improving the plugin and meeting different needs are welcome.

accepted.name: Raimonds Sarkanbardis
accepted.description: Working hard to make the world better with software.

plugins.tagline: Create custom image hotspots and export position data effortlessly.

plugins.name: Chaos Pattern
plugins.description:
Save time placing items in a grid pattern with random offsets, sizes and rotations, all of which can be fully customized.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more items, then click "Set" to use them as the pattern.
  2. Choose a frame or slide (Figma Slides) to apply the pattern.
  3. Click "Generate."
  4. Adjust the sliders to find the best settings.


Structure Settings

  1. Hexagon Grid: The horizontal position of every other row will be offset.
  2. Square Grid: Evenly spaced rows and columns.
  3. Circular Grid: Place items on a circular path.
  4. Spacing: distance between adjacent items.


Random Settings

Each slider represents how chaotic it is. 1 means very chaotic.

  1. Start Position: where the first item will start. 1 means random position of [-spacing, spacing] will be added.
  2. Rotation: how far each item can randomly rotate. 0.25 means between -45º and 45º, while 1 allows full rotation between -180º to 180º.
  3. Grid Offset: how far from their original grid position the items can randomly spawn. 0 means the items are locked to the grid.
  4. Transparency: the level of opacity to apply. 0 means no change. 0.25 means applying a random opacity between 0.75 and 1.
  5. Scale: how much scale factor should be randomly applied. 0.5 means the scale will be randomly chosen between 0.5x to 1x.


Pricing

  1. 5 free uses with full access to all features.
  2. Unlock unlimited access and future updates for a one-time purchase.


Tips

When you generate items multiple times on the same frame, the plugin recognizes which items it created and will automatically remove them for you. If you'd prefer to keep previously generated items, consider grouping them before generating new ones.


Credits

  1. Preview Bubble screen by Татьяна Крупина
  2. Preview Animal screen by dini.matu
  3. Preview Tree screen by The Visual Team

accepted.name: Saranomy
accepted.description: I make premium Figma Plugins

plugins.tagline: Place items on a grid with random offsets, sizes and rotations!

Each slider represents how chaotic it is. 1 means very chaotic.

  1. Start Position: where the first item will start. 1 means random position of [-spacing, spacing] will be added.
  2. Rotation: how far each item can randomly rotate. 0.25 means between -45º and 45º, while 1 allows full rotation between -180º to 180º.
  3. Grid Offset: how far from their original grid position the items can randomly spawn. 0 means the items are locked to the grid.
  4. Transparency: the level of opacity to apply. 0 means no change. 0.25 means applying a random opacity between 0.75 and 1.
  5. Scale: how much scale factor should be randomly applied. 0.5 means the scale will be randomly chosen between 0.5x to 1x.


Pricing

  1. 5 free uses with full access to all features.
  2. Unlock unlimited access and future updates for a one-time purchase.


Tips

When you generate items multiple times on the same frame, the plugin recognizes which items it created and will automatically remove them for you. If you'd prefer to keep previously generated items, consider grouping them before generating new ones.


Credits

  1. Preview Bubble screen by Татьяна Крупина
  2. Preview Animal screen by dini.matu
  3. Preview Tree screen by The Visual Team
121518.release_notes: Made it compatible with Figma Slides
121518.tagline: Place items on a grid with random offsets, sizes and rotations!

plugins.name: Figma Helpers
plugins.description:
Figma Helpers is a set of automated actions that speed up and help manage your workflow.


Count and go to instances of a component

Find the number of instances for any component and traverse to each instance found on your current page.


Make working with text easier

Select a text layer and separate it into individual text layers or export all the text within a group or component.


Organize and manage your page layers

Sort layers by name or name and type as well as collapse to your top-level layer to navigate your file easier.


Update AutoLayout properties for all children at once

Update the Auto Layout properties of all immediate children to either Fill or Fixed / Hug. Works for both height and width properties.


Reach out to me on Twitter if you have feedback or want me to add new actions.

plugins.name: MM Color Interpolation Grid
plugins.description:
Generate harmonious color palettes and explore smooth color transitions grids directly inside Figma.


Current version: 1.1.0


This plugin lets you create custom color interpolation grids using up to four corner colors. It’s perfect for designers exploring palette variations, easing models, or just geeking out on color theory.


Features:

  1. Choose top-left, top-right, bottom-left, and bottom-right colors.
  2. Generate harmonious starting color palettes with unique names in one click.
  3. Interpolate using multiple models: oklab, oklch, rgb, and more.
  4. Apply easing functions for smoother or creative transitions.
  5. Copy individual hex codes with one click.
  6. Insert the entire grid into your Figma file as named rectangles.
  7. Optionally create color styles for every cell, grouped by grid.


Great for:

  1. Building brand palettes
  2. Creating beautiful UI color scales/ramps
  3. Visualizing color transitions for design systems


A project by Alex Cristache & Mindful Motif.


A shout out to the creators of Culori and Color Name API for their invaluable resources.

accepted.name: Alex Cristache
accepted.description:
Founder & Principal Consultant (Design) 
at MindfulMotif. Seasoned designer and digital strategist. Explorer of art & color through #MindfulPalettes on X.

plugins.name: Text Dash
plugins.description:
Edit all the text layers in your selection in one place.

选中一次，编辑所有文字。


Now even in dark mode of Figma.

现已支持 Figma 暗色模式。


Intro

Text Dash will show all the text layers inside as you select any layers, and you can edit them quickly, saving you from keeping clicking layers to edit tons of text layers.


介绍

在选中图层的时候，Text Dash 会显示出内部所有的文本图层的文字内容。在 Text Dash 内部编辑文本时，改动会实时同步到文本图层当中。


How to Use

  1. open the Text Dash
  2. select any layers, including groups, frames, components, text layers, etc
  3. edit them as you see


如何使用

  1. 打开 Text Dash 插件
  2. 选中图层（包括 group 和 frame 等，也支持图层多选）
  3. 修改 Text Dash 中展示的文本，改动会实时同步到文本图层中


Roadmap

  1. Sort inputs according to geometry position. ✅
  2. Find and Replace (tell me if you want it).
  3. Add prefix or suffix in once.


路线图

  1. 根据图层位置排布输入框顺序✅
  2. 查找替换功能
  3. 批量增加前缀后缀功能


Contact

📬 Mail: tanshow@zju.edu.cn





﻿

plugins.name: Nester
plugins.description:
Nester will nest any object that resides above (but not inside) a top-level frame/artboard. 

If you have ever made a presentation or exported an asset only to find something you thought you put inside a frame, actually isn't, Nester will fix this automatically.

How to use:
Run Nester and it will detect if any object sits completely above another frame, and nest it inside. If the object overlaps the bounds of the frame and is not completely within a frame's bounds, it will leave the object as is.

accepted.name: Tom
accepted.description: Digital designer. Designer Advocate @Figma
